import {useSignIn} from "react-auth-kit"; function Login(props: any) { const signIn = useSignIn(); const submit = async (values: any) => { console.log(values) const post = await fetch('/api/user/login', { method: 'POST', body: values, headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" } }).then(res => res.json()) .then( signIn({ token: res }) ) } return <>

Login



} export default Login;
